name: Great Idea Website: User Interface
description: Great Idea Website displays the use of basic CSS styling as well as HTML semantics.
role: Study design image supplied for the desktop page.
Convert page into HTML using HTML semantics.
Style page using basic CSS to match supplied design image.

name: Great Idea Website: Responsive Design
description: This project converts a page from being desktop-only Great Idea Website to being mobile-friendly.
role: Review design files for each different screen type.
Introduce max-width media queries into your project at 800px and 500px.
Style page as close as possible to each design at the different breakpoints.

name: Fun Bus Travel Agency
description: Fun Bus Travel Agency is a page designed to be responsive by being built using FlexBox and the LESS preprocessor.
role: Study design files in order to create a page that looks good on many screen sizes.
Setup LESS and organize LESS files via imports.
Design page using FlexBox, LESS, and media queries.
